title: Payment calculator
description: No appointment needed. .. Open House Saturday  &  Sunday 12-1:30pm  Estate Sale! Priced to close quickly. Discover a great opportunity to own this floor through one-bedroom home on East 5th Street, nestled between Second and Third Avenues. Stretching the entire length of the building, this residence offers bright southern views from the living room and serene northern exposures from the bedroom. (Only 3 flights up)  Upon entering, you’re welcomed by abundant natural light, a treetop view, a decorative fireplace , and classic hardwood floors . The kitchen features full-size appliances , Corian countertops , and plenty of space for a dining table, pantry, or buffet. Between the kitchen and the bedroom lies a versatile bonus area , perfect as a dining room, home office, or flex space to suit your lifestyle. Can easily be combined with the bedroom to create a massive bedroom suite. The bedroom overlooks a beautifully landscaped garden terrace and open sky. The windowed bathroom has been fully gut-renovated and waterproofed. Monthly taxes and HOA fees are billed together for a combined total of $1,541.  Don’t miss this East Village gem. .. contact us today for a private showing. *  *  * All furnisher is virtually staged.
